text: Bigu: "Ej ahli kitoʙ, sumo ʙar hec [oini duruste] nested, magar in ki Tavrot va Incil va on ciro, ki az tarafi Parvardigoraton ʙar sumo nozil sudaast, ʙarpo dored". Va [ej pajomʙar] ʙe tardid, on ci az suji Parvardigorat ʙar tu nozil sudaast, ʙar sarkasi va kufri ʙisjore az onon meafzojad, pas, ʙar [in] guruhi kofir afsus maxur
